biotools.summary: LICHEM is a software package that can interface with Gaussian, PSI4, NWChem, TINKER, and TINKER–HP to enable QM/MM calculations using multipolar/polarizable force fields.

bioschemas.name: LICHEM
bioschemas.summary: LICHEM is a software package that can interface with Gaussian, PSI4, NWChem, TINKER, and TINKER–HP to enable QM/MM calculations using multipolar/polarizable force fields.
